metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14501 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds read flaw exists in parse_file_info in archive_read_support_format_iso9660.c in libarchive 3.3.2 when extracting a specially crafted iso9660 iso file, related to archive_read_format_iso9660_read_header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14501` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.4').
